availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Burke (Mercer County Toll Gate Keeper/farmer)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, toll gate keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Burke. Father of William P. Burke, Eliza Burke, and John L. Burke. Toll gate keeper in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 79.
Find A Grave, "John H Burks (December 17, 1818-March 28, 1908)," Memorial #39793598, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/39793598 (accessed April 16, 2018).
